verses.verse: וּבִשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year אַחַ֗ת <WH259> Now in the first לְכ֙וֹרֶשׁ֙ <WH3566> of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> of Persia לִכְל֥וֹת <WH3615> might be fulfilled דְּבַר־ <WH1697> that the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִפִּ֣י <WH6310> by the mouth יִרְמְיָ֑ה <WH3414> of Jeremiah הֵעִ֣יר <WH5782> stirred up יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> the spirit כֹּ֣רֶשׁ <WH3566> of Cyrus מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> of Persia וַיַּֽעֲבֶר־ <WH5674> sent קוֹל֙ <WH6963> A proclamation בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> throughout all his kingdom וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also בְּמִכְתָּ֖ב <WH4385> and [put it] also in writing לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֗ר <WH559> Thus saith כֹּ֚רֶשׁ <WH3566> Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> of Persia כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> me all the kingdoms הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth נָ֣תַן <WH5414> hath given לִ֔י יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> and He פָקַ֤ד <WH6485> and he hath charged עָלַי֙ <WH5921> and לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> me to build ל֣וֹ בַ֔יִת <WH1004> him an house בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בִּֽיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> which [is] in Judah

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Whoever בָכֶ֣ם מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all עַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> his people יְהִ֤י <WH1961> become אֱלֹהָיו֙ <WH430> God עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וְיַ֕עַל <WH5927> be with him and let him go up לִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בִּיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> which [is] in Judah וְיִ֗בֶן <WH1129> and build אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel ה֥וּא <WH1931> He הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> is the God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Every הַנִּשְׁאָ֗ר <WH7604> And whosoever remaineth מִֽכָּל־ <WH3605> Every הַמְּקֹמוֹת֮ <WH4725> in any place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which ה֣וּא <WH1931> he גָֽר־ <WH1481> where he sojourneth שָׁם֒ <WH8033> in it יְנַשְּׂא֙וּהוּ֙ <WH5375> help אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> the men מְקֹמ֔וֹ <WH4725> of his place בְּכֶ֥סֶף <WH3701> him with silver וּבְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and with gold וּבִרְכ֣וּשׁ <WH7399> and with goods וּבִבְהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and with beasts עִם־ <WH5973> together הַ֨נְּדָבָ֔ה <WH5071> beside the freewill offering לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> for the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> that [is] in Jerusalem

וַיָּק֜וּמוּ <WH6965> Then rose up רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> the chief הָאָב֗וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> and Benjamin וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> and the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> and the Levites לְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> everyone הֵעִ֤יר <WH5782> had raised הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God אֶת־ <WH853> רוּח֔וֹ <WH7307> with all [them] whose spirit לַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> to go up לִבְנ֔וֹת <WH1129> to build אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> which [is] in Jerusalem

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All סְבִיבֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH5439> And all they that [were] about חִזְּק֣וּ <WH2388> them strengthened בִֽידֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3027> their hands בִּכְלֵי־ <WH3627> with vessels כֶ֧סֶף <WH3701> of silver בַּזָּהָ֛ב <WH2091> with gold בָּרְכ֥וּשׁ <WH7399> with goods וּבַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> and with beasts וּבַמִּגְדָּנ֑וֹת <WH4030> and with precious things לְבַ֖ד <WH905> aside עַל־ <WH5921> from כָּל־ <WH3605> all הִתְנַדֵּֽב׃ <WH5068> beside all [that] was willingly offered ס

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king כּ֔וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> Also Cyrus הוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> the vessels בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הוֹצִ֤יא <WH3318> had brought forth נְבֽוּכַדְנֶצַּר֙ <WH5019> which Nebuchadnezzar מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> out of Jerusalem וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <WH5414> and had put בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> them in the house אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> of his gods

וַיּֽוֹצִיאֵ֗ם <WH3318> bring forth כּ֚וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> Even those did Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֔ס <WH6539> of Persia עַל־ <WH5921> out יַ֖ד <WH3027> by the hand מִתְרְדָ֣ת <WH4990> of Mithredath הַגִּזְבָּ֑ר <WH1489> the treasurer וַֽיִּסְפְּרֵם֙ <WH5608> and numbered לְשֵׁשְׁבַּצַּ֔ר <WH8339> them unto Sheshbazzar הַנָּשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> the prince לִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> another מִסְפָּרָ֑ם <WH4557> And this [is] the number אֲגַרְטְלֵ֨י <WH105> chargers זָהָ֜ב <WH2091> of gold שְׁלֹשִׁ֗ים <WH7970> of them thirty אֲגַרְטְלֵי־ <WH105> chargers כֶ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> of silver אָ֔לֶף <WH505> a thousand מַחֲלָפִ֖ים <WH4252> knives תִּשְׁעָ֥ה <WH8672> nine וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> and twenty ס

כְּפוֹרֵ֤י <WH3713> basons זָהָב֙ <WH2091> of gold שְׁלֹשִׁ֔ים <WH7970> Thirty כְּפ֤וֹרֵי <WH3713> basons כֶ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> silver מִשְׁנִ֔ים <WH4932> of a second אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> [sort] four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַעֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> and ten כֵּלִ֥ים <WH3627> vessels אֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> [and] other אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> a thousand ס

כָּל־ <WH3605> all כֵּלִים֙ <WH3627> All the vessels לַזָּהָ֣ב <WH2091> of gold וְלַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> and of silver חֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <WH2568> [were] five אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> and four מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred הַכֹּ֞ל <WH3605> all הֶעֱלָ֣ה <WH5927> bring up שֵׁשְׁבַּצַּ֗ר <WH8339> All [these] did Sheshbazzar עִ֚ם <WH5973> who הֵעָל֣וֹת <WH5927> that were brought up הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> with [them of] the captivity מִבָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> from Babylon לִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> unto Jerusalem פ
